short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize webpage content and ask questions based on context.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that allows users to select text on any webpage, summarize it using the Gemini API, and ask further questions based on the webpage content. The extension features a futuristic, movable chatbox with a transparent background, providing an interactive and intuitive way to explore and understand web content.
